47$Anxious$4/17/2013 7:02:09 AM$Reviewer: 45-54 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient) $5$5$5$PTSD symptoms have markedly decreased.

column2: 13-18 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient) $4$3$5$I have been taking this medication for about 3 weeks now
column3: and I have been satisfied with the results.  It has cured all my problems
column4: but I have experienced some side effects.  The first night I threw up the color of the medication.  This only happened the first night
column5: then it got much better.  There has been off and on constipation with this medication
column6: but it is tolerable.  This medication is the second I have been on for my disorder
column7: and I like it much better than the first.  I am not getting any emotional side effects

column1: 53$Anxious$9/21/2012 12:39:08 PM$Reviewer: 75 or over Male  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient) $2$2$5$prescribed for sleep aid

column2: 55-64 Female  on Treatment for 6 months to less than 1 year (Patient) $5$5$5$This drug has been a lifesaver for me.  I've been diagnosed with anxiety/depression and Imipramine has made all the difference in the world.  I no longer have sleep problems
column4: I'm happy all the time and I take pleasure in life.  Thank God!
